titles.title: A resolution commending Peter S. Taylor for his long, loyal and dedicated service to the United States Senate and the Senate Committee on Indian Affairs.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Commends Peter S. Taylor for his contributions and accomplishment in the field of Indian law and policy and his services to the Senate.
